thoughts.text: Since the 'browse_website' command did not provide information about the current state of the debt ceiling in the US, I suggest using the 'execute_shell' command to search for news articles about the debt ceiling on a search engine.

args.command_line: curl -s 'https://www.google.com/search?q=debt+ceiling+us+news' | pup 'div#search div.g div.rc h3 a attr{href}'
